resources.string: This application needs special permissions to be able to access calendar notifications. Open Settings app to grant such access?
This app needs no UI!\n\nSimple enable the app:
And this app will keep calendar notifications for you until you dismiss them!

Why?
This is because Google Calendar Notification would only stay for about an hour and then they disappear.
Not everyone likes this behavior.

How it works?
This app would catch all notifications from Google Calendar and will replace them with identical notifications that would open the same event when clicked
